catalog.name: Protected Areas Database of the U.S. v2.0

items.name: Cached Data Layers - Regional scale data that load quickly
items.description: These layers are suitable for most users

items.name: PAD-US 2.0 DOD Boundaries
items.shortReport:
Includes Department of Defense planning boundaries suitable for distribution in the public domain from PAD-US 2.0. Some sensitive sites are not included and internal ownership is not represented (but presumed Federal).
Note: these data will not draw past a scale of 1:75,000. If you need city-level data, please click 'Add Data' above for access to the data catalog of Dynamic Data Layers.

items.name: PAD-US 2.0 Proclamation and Other Planning Boundaries
items.shortReport:
Includes boundaries that provide additional context by administrative agency name (for example, DOD, FWS, NPS, USFS) shown with an outline as internal ownership is not represented.
Note: these data will not draw past a scale of 1:75,000. If you need city-level data, please click 'Add Data' above for access to the data catalog of Dynamic Data Layers.

items.name: PAD-US 2.0 Public Access
items.shortReport:
General level of public access permitted in the area - Open, Restricted (permit, seasonal), Closed, or Unknown from the combined PAD-US Inventory (local parks data gaps exist).
Note: these data will not draw past a scale of 1:75,000. If you need city-level data, please click 'Add Data' above for access to the data catalog of Dynamic Data Layers.

items.name: PAD-US 2.0 Protected Areas by Manager
items.shortReport:
All protected areas classified by GAP Status Code protection level and manager type.
Note: these data will not draw past a scale of 1:75,000. If you need city-level data, please click 'Add Data' above for access to the data catalog of Dynamic Data Layers.

items.name: PAD-US 2.0 Protection Status by GAP Status Code
items.shortReport:
A measure of management intent to permanently protect biodiversity or manage for multiple uses (including extraction) for all lands and marine areas in the combined PAD-US Inventory.
Note: these data will not draw past a scale of 1:75,000. If you need city-level data, please click 'Add Data' above for access to the data catalog of Dynamic Data Layers.

items.name: PAD-US 2.0 Federal Management Agencies
items.shortReport:
Use to depict federal agency land managers or administrators (no state, local, or nonprofit lands) by name from the combined PAD-US inventory(includes designations, easements and marine). DOD Military Lands are shown with an outline as internal interests are not defined (but assumed Federal).
Note: these data will not draw past a scale of 1:75,000. If you need city-level data, please click 'Add Data' above for access to the data catalog of Dynamic Data Layers.

items.name: PAD-US 2.0 Manager Name
items.shortReport:
Categorization by name, with detailed federal managers (BLM, NPS, USFS, etc.) and generic state/local/other managers from the combined PAD-US inventory (includes designations, easements and marine) with descriptions from the 'Agency Name' Domain, 'Manager Name' Field. DOD Military Lands are shown with an outline as internal interests are not defined (but assumed Federal).

Note: these data will not draw past a scale of 1:75000. If you need city-level data, please click 'Add Data' above for access to the data catalog of Dynamic Data Layers.

items.name: PAD-US 2.0 Manager Type
items.shortReport:
Broad categorization of manager levels, for general depictions (Federal, State, Local, etc.) of who manages areas from the combined PAD-US inventory with descriptions from the 'Agency Type' Domain, 'Manager Type' Field.
Note: these data will not draw past a scale of 1:75,000. If you need city-level data, please click 'Add Data' above for access to the data catalog of Dynamic Data Layers.

items.name: PAD-US 2.0 Protection Mechanism Category
items.shortReport:
Shows categories of land tenure for all protected areas, and also includes marine ares, proclamation, and other planning boundaries from the combined PAD-US inventory.
Note: these data will not draw past a scale of 1:75,000. If you need city-level data, please click 'Add Data' above for access to the data catalog of Dynamic Data Layers.

items.name: PAD-US 2.0 Federal Fee Managers (Authoritative Data)
items.shortReport:
Describes federal administrative agencies from the 'Manager Name' field. Includes fee simple parcels (where available) from authoritative data sources from PAD-US 2.0 Fee feature class (no designations, easements, or marine). DOD Military Lands shown as an outline as internal land ownership is not represented (but implied Federal).
Note: these data will not draw past a scale of 1:75,000. If you need city-level data, please click 'Add Data' above for access to the data catalog of Dynamic Data Layers.

items.name: PAD-US 2.0 Fee Managers
items.shortReport:
Standardized administrative agency or entity name (USFS, BLM, State Fish and Wildlife, State Parks and Rec, City, NGO, etc) from the 'Manager Name' field. Includes fee simple parcels (where available) from the PAD-US 2.0 Fee feature Class only (no designations, easements or marine).
Note: these data will not draw past a scale of 1:75,000. If you need city-level data, please click 'Add Data' above for access to the data catalog of Dynamic Data Layers.
